Layer.SetCommand:
%function(self) local life = SCREENMAN('LifeDifficulty'):GetText() local lifenumber = math.floor(string.gsub(life,'life difficulty ',''))
self:settext(life) if lifenumber ~= 4 then self:diffuseshift() self:effectcolor1(1,0.2,0.2,1) end
end

%function(self) local track = SCREENMAN('Songs'):GetText() local vers = SCREENMAN('Version'):GetText()
self:settext(track..'\n'..vers)
end
